article_text:
The Monmouth County DWI Task force in will conduct a checkpoint from 11 p.m. Friday through 3 a.m. Saturday on Hope Road. (Photo: Digital Collections/IPTC)

The Monmouth County DWI Task force in will conduct a checkpoint from 11 p.m. Friday through 3 a.m. Saturday on Hope Road.

Task force members and officers from the Tinton Falls Police Department will pull over vehicles from the southbound lanes on Hope Road into the Centre Plaza parking lot to determine driver’s sobriety, according to a release.

Andrew Ford: 732-643-4281; aford3@gannettnj.com

Read or Share this story: http://on.app.com/1Pt5XfK
